code: import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";var initialState={tickets:[],isLoading:false,error:"",searchTicketList:[],selectedTicket:{},replyMsg:""};var ticketListSlice=createSlice({name:"ticketList",initialState:initialState,reducers:{fetchTicketLoading:function fetchTicketLoading(state,action){state.isLoading=true;},fetchTicketSuccess:function payload=_ref.payload;state.isLoading=false;state.error=payload;},searchTickets:function searchTickets(state,_ref2){var fetchSingleTicketSuccess(state,_ref3){var payload=_ref3.payload;state.selectedTicket=payload;state.isLoading=false;state.error="";},fetchSingleTicketFail:function fetchSingleTicketFail(state,_ref4){var payload=_ref4.payload;state.isLoading=false;state.error=payload;},replyTicketLoading:function replyTicketLoading(state){state.isLoading=true;},replyTicketSuccess:function replyTicketSuccess(state,_ref5){var payload=_ref5.payload;state.isLoading=false;state.error="";state.replyMsg=payload;},replyTicketFail:function replyTicketFail(state,_ref6){var reducer=ticketListSlice.reducer,actions=ticketListSlice.actions;var fetchTicketLoading=actions.fetchTicketLoading,fetchTicketSuccess=actions.fetchTicketSuccess,fetchTicketFail=actions.fetchTicketFail,searchTickets=actions.searchTickets,fetchSingleTicketLoading=actions.fetchSingleTicketLoading,fetchSingleTicketSuccess=actions.fetchSingleTicketSuccess,fetchSingleTicketFail=actions.fetchSingleTicketFail,replyTicketLoading=actions.replyTicketLoading,replyTicketSuccess=actions.replyTicketSuccess,replyTicketFail=actions.replyTicketFail,closeTicketLoading=actions.closeTicketLoading,closeTicketSuccess=actions.closeTicketSuccess,closeTicketFail=actions.closeTicketFail,resetResponseMsg=actions.resetResponseMsg;export{fetchTicketLoading,fetchTicketSuccess,fetchTicketFail,searchTickets,fetchSingleTicketLoading,fetchSingleTicketSuccess,fetchSingleTicketFail,replyTicketLoading,replyTicketSuccess,replyTicketFail,closeTicketLoading,closeTicketSuccess,closeTicketFail,resetResponseMsg};export
